Reviews.Title: Great 2D! Meh 3d. Ok for games.
Reviews.Author: R. SEVERSON
Reviews.Content: This has been a great TV. I've had it for over a year. The 2d performance for movies is amazing... The input lag (66ms) is a bit high for gaming but has not provided any problems. The 3d is pretty terrible with a muddled picture and lots of cross talk. For everything I use it for this TV is amazing. Picture quality is bright and clear, colors are accurate and not over done. Would HIGHLY recommend this TV for 2d use.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in Wi-Fi® for Wireless Internet TV and more1
Brilliant Full HD (1080p) picture quality for 2D & 3D
LED backlit for incredible contrast & slim design
X-RealityTM Engine for a clear, vivid, life-like picture
Smooth motion clarity with MotionFlowTM XR 240
ProductInfo.Name: Sony - KDL55EX723 55" 3D Internet LED
